text: aur yaad karo jab isaraeel kee santaan se hamane vachan liya, "allaah ke atirikt kisee kee bandagee na karoge; aur maan-baap ke saath aur naatedaaron ke saath aur anaathon aur muhataajon ke saath achchha vyavahaar karoge; aur yah ki logon se bhalee baat kaho aur namaaz qaayam karo aur zakaat do." to tum phir gae, bas tumamen se bache thode hee, aur tum upeksha kee neeti hee apanae rahe
